title: Is a baby care blog profitable? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello, Step1) Create your account on GOOGLE TRENDS Step2) Search For “ Baby Care “, then you will be able to find the traffic surfing the keyword. Conclusion: If Traffic is favorable then you can Publish Your Blogs on Baby Care. Hope it helps, If so then check out a link in my Quora Profile and Consider Giving an Upvote.

Yes, it is. I would recommend trying out a blogging platform first like ScRiBzO, where you start earning as soon as you publish your first article. Once you get a hold of your audience, move out to your own WordPress blog.
